squint.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to look at something with your eyes partly closed in order to see better
squint.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Anna squinted in the sudden bright sunlight.
Stop squinting at the screen â€“ put your glasses on.
squint.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to have each eye looking in a slightly different direction
squint.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a condition of your eye muscles that makes each eye look in a slightly different direction
